titles.title: You Must Be Born Again (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You must be born again You must be born again I verily verily say unto you You must be born again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A ruler once came To Jesus by night To ask Him the way Of salvation and light The Master made answer In words true and plain You must be born again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You children of men Attend to the word So solemnly uttered By Jesus the Lord And let not this message To you be in vain You must be born again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O you who would enter That glorious rest And sing with the ransomed The song of the blest The life everlasting If you would obtain You must be born again{/lang-eng}
